Hire & Pricing

We want to make every occasion special, with tailored packages to suit your needs. All you need to do is get in touch, let us know your budget and we can arrange a bespoke package especially for you and your guests.


Here are couple of our typical price packages:


FIZZ AS YOU GO PACKAGE £300

– 3 hours private hire of the Prosecco Van
– Pay by the glass (£4)
– Pay by the bottle: 75cl Prosecco (£20)

FIZZALICIOUS PACKAGE £650

– 3 hours private hire of the Prosecco Van
– 20L barrel of Frizzante
– 160 disposable champagne style flutes

EXTRAS

– Additional keg of Prosecco (£200)
– Option of tap serving Craft Beer or Lager (£200)
– We can also provide extra glasses if needed, price based on quantity

We require a minimum deposit of £100 to secure your booking and payment in full one week before your event. This is fully refundable provided that you cancel 14 days prior to your booking. (We accept cash or card).


A member of staff will be present to serve the drinks, allowing you and your guest to relax and enjoy the occasion. However, you also have the option to get involved and let your guests serve themselves if they would prefer!
